name: CelestialPersperation Hollow(Ludum Dare 52)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52

Just your average farming game. Except for the fact that you can get a gun. You also might be able to rob a store.

Definitely not based on Stardew valley and the name of my game is made up of synonyms for parts of that game's name.

Made on stream at twitch.tv/derpygamer2142
